title: [$300 PRIZE] Oceanic Amateur Championship Series - Open Tournament

embed.description: Battlefy is the simplest way to start, manage, and find esports tournaments | Create. Compete. Conquer.

body:
Good evening everyone,
One month from now I am pleased to announce that the Oceanic Amateur Championship Series will be run on Sunday the 30th of June of this year. Here is what you need to know; 8 teams will enter with a $50 buy-in, 1 team will emerge victorious with the $300 Grand Prize, winner takes all. More details below:

_- 8 Team Positions, first come first serve.
- Open to ALL ranks! (Current OCS and OPL players are not eligible however including substitutes and reserves).
- $50 buy-in to be paid in full by the 23rd of June. 
- Winner takes all the prizing.
- Best of 1, Single Elimination.
- All games will be streamed until the nexus falls._

For those interested in this tournament, please join the Discord via the link here: https://discord.gg/y3uU3Vm
If anyone has any inquiries, please message me in the Discord.
Thank you all!

EDIT - "Current OCS and OPL players are not eligible however." Added, "..including substitutes and reserves."

replies.body: probs to the people spending all the time organising the event
